metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39140 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: XStream is a simple library to serialize objects to XML and back again. Inaffected versions this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker toallocate 100% CPU time on the target system depending on CPU type orparallel execution of such a payload resulting in a denial of service onlyby manipulating the processed input stream. No user is affected, whofollowed the recommendation to setup XStream's security framework with awhitelist limited to the minimal required types. XStream 1.4.18 uses nolonger a blacklist by default, since it cannot be secured for generalpurpose.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
